General.Name: Zhe Jiang Kangsheng Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhe Jiang Kangsheng Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of refrigeration pipelines and accessories, and new energy commercial vehicles in China. The company offers refrigeration steel, aluminum, and copper tubes, pipes, and accessories; air-conditioning heat exchanger products and parts; aluminum sheets; and condensers and evaporators. It also provides pure electric tourist buses, pure electric buses, pure electric logistics vehicles, hydrogen fuel cell buses, pure electric touring cars, and pure electric airport shuttle buses; and financing lease, small loans, and other financial services. Zhe Jiang Kangsheng Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Chunan, China.
